question: Don't! You're such a romantic, J.D. Whatever. Even if I wanted to meet other women, I wouldn't even know what to do. I've been out of the game so long. Sounds tempting, but I can't. Berenson needs me to update the financial models for his meeting with the foreign investors. No I don't. The Germans are taking an earlier flight back, so the meeting's been moved to tomorrow. J.D. thinks for a moment. Who? J.D. gets a big smile on his face. He has an idea. Harold, listen, I need you to update these models for me.
answer: But aren't you supposed to...

question: I know, but something came up. I have to meet with some clients tonight, so I won't be able to get to it. It's your responsibility now. Okay? Harold doesn't like this, but before he even has a chance to protest, J.D. steps forward...
answer: Uh...okay...no problem... BILLY drops a big stack of papers on Harold's desk.

question: Wow! I can't believe how easy that was!
answer: Fuck.

question: Mononucleosis or mono is an infection caused by the Epstein-Barr virus. Symptoms may include fever, sore throat, headaches, white patches on the back of your throat, swollen glands, sluggishness and loss of appetite.
answer: Excellent, Kumar. I have to say you're one of the best applicants I've ever interviewed. Not that it's a surprise. Your father is very respected in his field. You know he and I had some pretty wild times when we were in med school.

question: Really?
answer: Yeah. We started our own basketball team-- the Hemoglobin Trotters... Yeah, we were crazy. Kumar nods and smiles. Woodruff finally stops laughing... Anyway-- just one more question. What are some potential symptoms of pancreatitis?

question: Let's see. There might be epigastric tenderness, diffuse abdominal tenderness... Suddenly, we hear what sounds like be a match being lit, a gurgle, and a cough -- the distinct sounds of somebody smoking from a bong. Dr. Woodruff is confused. Kumar pulls out his cell phone. It's his personalized ringer. I'm sorry. Can you hold on one second? Kumar stands up and answers his cell phone. Kumar's phone. Kumar speaking. Oh, hey. Nothing important. I can talk. What's up? Dr. Woodruff is offended. He takes a sip of from a mug of coffee and watches as Kumar begins pacing around the office. Intercut:
answer: I'm not gonna be able to partake in our usual Friday night ritual. I've gotta stay late at the office.

question: Fuck that shit! We had plans! Dr. Woodruff can't believe Kumar's choice of words.
answer: I know, but I gotta get this work done.

question: Oh come on! When has getting high ever prevented you from finishing your work? Dr. Woodruff is so shocked that the mug of coffee simply slips out of his hands. Hot coffee goes all over his shirt. Woodruff yells and starts wiping his shirt with a napkin.
answer: Listen, I'd love to go home, but...

question: No fucking buts! I just bought a quarter of the finest herb in New York City, and I'm not smoking it alone. Okay, where was I? Oh yes. More symptoms of pancreatitis. Um...decreased bowel sounds, possibly fever, dehydration, and sometimes even shock.
answer: Mr. Patel. This is supposed to be a proper interview. Do you actually believe after the way you've behaved that I would ever even consider recommending you for admission?

question: No. I'd actually be pretty surprised. Dr. Woodruff is flustered. He doesn't know how to react. Look, I'm just interviewing so my dad will keep paying for my apartment. I'm not really planning on going to med school.
answer: But...you have perfect MCAT scores!

question: Okay, be yourself. Don't be nervous. So Maria, what's been going on?
answer: Oh, nothing. It's just been a long week. How about you?

question: My week was great. Work wasn't too bad. I caught up on some sleep. Plus, the guy who works next to me decided to bathe for a change.
answer: Really?

question: Oh wait, I meant the exact opposite of that. Work sucked. I barely slept. And the guy next to me still smells like crap. But a man can dream, right? So what are you up to tonight?
answer: Actually, I'm probably gonna work out a little bit, clean up the apartment, and then go over to my boyfriend's place. He's cooking me a really nice dinner.

question: Really?
answer: Oh wait, I meant the exact opposite of that. I'll actually probably just sit on my ass, eat a pint of Hagaan Daz, and watch Blind Date.

question: That sounds awful. Harold laughs, as does Maria. They smile at each other... Well, if you want some company, maybe you could sit on your ass at my place.
answer: Maybe. Bye.

question: Bye. Kumar?
answer: Yeah, I'm in here! Harold walks over to Kumar's room and looks inside. It's Martha Stewart's nightmare-- dirty laundry all over the floor, etc. On his walls we see old school gangsta rap posters. MARIJUANA PARAPHERNALIA is everywhere. We see a Giant Photograph of Kumar with his arm around Mr. T. Kumar is not in the room, however.

question: Kumar?
answer: In here... Curious, Harold walks over to HIS ROOM , where he sees KUMAR STANDING BUTT NAKED IN FRONT OF A FULL-LENGTH MIRROR. There's a "clipping sound" coming from Kumar's direction. Harold stares at him, shocked and appalled. Harold walks inside...

question: Kumar, what the hell are you doing!
answer: I'm trimming my pubes. Kumar looks at himself in the mirror as he makes a couple more snips. On the floor, we see LARGE CLUMPS OF HAIR.

question: Why aren't you doing this in your room!
answer: The mirror's in here. Hey, check it out! It looks like a Bonsai tree!

question: I'm gonna puke. Get your clothes on.
answer: Chill out. It makes my Johnson look bigger. Besides, if I don't do this, I'll end up with pubes like my dad. You've seen Osama Bin Laden's beard, right? HAROLD notices something...

question: Are those my scissors? Oh my God! I trim my nose hair with those!
answer: Dude, I've been cutting my ass hair with them for the past six months.

question: GET THE HELL OUT OF MY ROOM! Kumar puts the scissors down and EXITS THE ROOM. Harold shakes his head and sets up his laptop on his desk...
answer: So what the hell is your problem, anyway?

question: Other than my roommate's boney ass? One of the senior analysts asked me to do a bunch of his work for him tonight. Kumar walks back into Harold's room...
answer: I assume you gave him the appropriate "go fuck yourself."

question: If by "go fuck yourself" you mean "no problem sir" then yes, he got the message loud and clear. KUMAR shakes his head in disgust...
answer: Oh, no wonder you tried cancelling on me today. Dude, you gotta learn how to say "no" once in a while. Now lets get high.

question: No. I got a lot of work to finish. Kumar shuts Harold's laptop.
answer: Fuck that! You'll have plenty of time to get that shit done later. Come on, let's smoke a couple joints. Harold thinks for a moment and then caves...

question: One joint.
answer: One and a half. Now let's do this... Kumar exits the room... HAROLD hangs his jacket up in his closet, which we see organized in rows of suits and button downs.

question: Don't you think you should take at least one of your interviews seriously? At some point your dad's gonna get really pissed.
answer: So what? It's not like there's a shortage of Dr. Patel's out there. My dad's a doctor. My brother's a doctor. Just because everyone in my family went to med school, doesn't mean I have to.

question: Well, then what are you going to do?
answer: I'll tell you what I'm gonna do. I'm gonna smoke this fat blunt, get ridiculously high, and then get something to eat.

question: Sounds like a plan.
answer: I think we've already seen this one. Harold changes the channel... I love that shit! Harold continues flipping channels...

question: Nice. Sixteen Candles is on.
answer: And the award for least heterosexual statement ever made in this apartment goes to...

question: Oh come on. It's a John Hughes movie! It's a classic! It's a beautiful story about someone who feels unnoticed, unappreciated, unloved...
answer: Hey look! It's you! Kumar points to the TV where we see a CLIP FROM SIXTEEN CANDLES-- Kumar laughs. Harold isn't amused. We see another CLIP . Hey, when are you gonna start doing some chores around here? Harold gives Kumar a "don't even joke" look. He then violently grabs the bong from Kumar and lights it. Kumar laughs as Harold exhales a lot of smoke...

question: We're so high right now.
answer: We're not low.

question: I don't know about you, but I'm hungry as balls.
answer: No shit! Let's eat! HAROLD bends down and picks up A BUNCH OF DELIVERY MENUS that have been left on the floor... Nah, I don't feel like delivery tonight.

question: What about KFC?
answer: Nah, we've been there too many times. I want something we haven't had in awhile. Something different. Something that'll really hit the spot. I want the perfect food...

question: We're talking about Katie Holmes here. You would never think a sweet, innocent girl like her would ever take her top off. Which is precisely why we have to watch her do it.
answer: Dude, the things I'd eat out of her ass, you have no idea. Bacon, shellfish, milk with meat, you name it...

question: That's a very vulgar statement.
answer: So is "I want to pound Britney Spears in the pussy." But it's true.

question: What the hell are you bringing that for? Harold hands Kumar his keys.
answer: You're driving. I'm gonna try to get some of my work done in the car. Kumar then checks his pockets and comes up empty.

question: Shit, I forgot my cell phone.
answer: Why don't you just run back and get it?

question: Nah, we've gone too far. Reveal that the guys are less than 20 feet from their door. "Bing!" The elevator door opens and the guys enter. Hey, there's your girlfriend. You actually gonna talk to her this time? What the hell are you doing? That was a perfect opportunity! You could have asked her if she wanted to go to White Castle. Harold doesn't say anything. He looks down in shame. You're worthless.
answer: I'm not worthwhile.

question: Dude, it's only awkward because you're a pussy. Just talk to her once and I promise you it won't be weird anymore...
answer: It doesn't matter. The only girls interested in me are girls I have no interest in. Like Cindy Kim.

question: Speaking of Cindy, she called earlier. One of those 58 Asian clubs she's in is throwing a party at her dorm tonight.
answer: God, she invites me to everything.

question: Why do I have to be the catcher?
answer: Dude, forget about those pricks. Let's just go. They continue walking... Jesus, that took forever. You know the purpose of a car is to avoid walking. And what kind of parking job is this? You're like a mile away from the curb.

question: Don't even start.
answer: Just fucking with you. Now let's go out and get those burgers. I'm fucking starving! They get in the car and slam the door. The engine starts and the car takes off, revealing that they were parked next to a Hey, Rold-- do you think C3PO is gay?

question: Of course he's gay! You remember in the first Star Wars when he was like... "Thank the maker! This oil bath is going to feel soooo good!" Kumar laughs.
answer: Dude, give me thirty-five cents. HAROLD sorts through some change in his hand and gives Kumar the money. KUMAR tosses the change into the basket and waits for the TOLL BOOTH STOPLIGHT to turn green. It doesn't. What's going on? It didn't register. Dude, give me thirty-five more cents.

question: I don't have anymore change.
answer: Should I just go through?

question: No. I don't like breaking the law. Harold licks the joint as he puts the finishing touches on.
answer: I can see that. A CAR HONKS BEHIND THEM. Kumar turns around and sees a number of cars lining up behind them. Right behind them, A BIG BURLY GUY leans his head out of a car... I'm going through.

question: Just hold on. I'll walk over to one of the manned booths and tell them what happened. The honking continues as HAROLD starts to open the door... Are you crazy? Oh shit, we're dead! Harold throws the joint out the window.
answer: What the fuck is wrong with you?!

question: You just tore out of there! The cops are gonna catch us!
answer: No they're not!

question: Take this exit!
answer: What? That was the last of our weed.

question: Look, I get a little paranoid sometimes.
answer: Now we're in Newark of all places. You know we're gonna get shot.

question: Maybe it's not as bad as they say. It's probably just a bunch of hype. They look out the window and see another ASIAN and INDIAN guy walking down the street. Suddenly, THREE HOODS jump out from an alley and start beating the living shit out of Daniel and Shankar. Kumar gives Harold a dirty look. Let's get the hell out of here. KUMAR continues driving. He makes a turn. All of a sudden, he stops short, causing he and HAROLD to jerk forward quickly. What the... Dude, we are NOT driving through that basketball game!
answer: We have to if we want to get out of here. Kumar points to a sign indicating that the HIGHWAY is ahead.

question: Forget about it. No way.
answer: Come on. How do you know they're not peaceful Gregory Hines-like black guys? With that, the HUGEST ANGRIEST BLACK MAN OF ALL TIME ROARS AS HE COMPLETES A MONSTER DUNK. In celebration, he violently bumps chests with his teammates.

question: Turn the car around.
answer: Why? Are cars not allowed to go through when a game's going on? When we were kids, we used to move to the side when we were playing in the street. The HUGEST ANGRIEST BLACK MAN stares HAROLD and KUMAR down.

question: For some reason, I don't think this is the same thing.
answer: I'm going through. KUMAR begins inching forward.

question: Don't! The BASKETBALL PLAYERS slowly begin moving aside.
answer: Look. They're moving. I told you. Even though the Players are making way for Harold and Kumar, they're still no more than a foot or two from the car at all times. Harold is scared shitless. He then notices the HUGEST ANGRIEST BLACK MAN holding the basketball.

question: Shit, he's gonna throw the ball at us.
answer: How do you know?

question: Look at him! The HUGEST ANGRIEST BLACK MAN has an ESPECIALLY ANGRY FACE.
answer: Oh fuck. KUMAR puts the pedal to the metal and ZOOMS AWAY FROM THEM.

question: That was close, dude.
answer: Rold, check it out! We're almost there!

question: Yes! Thank God! I'm starving!
answer: Well, prepare to gorge yourself.

question: Oh man, I'm so hungry. I'm gonna eat like twenty of those burgers.
answer: I'll see your twenty and raise you five orders of fries.

question: God, where the hell is this place?
answer: Don't worry, we'll find it. HAROLD sees a HIGH SCHOOL up ahead...

question: There's the multiplex!
answer: That means the White Castle should be just around the corner...

question: What the hell's going on, Kumar?! That doesn't look like a White Castle to me!
answer: We gotta get to the bottom of this!

question: We gotta get to the bottom of this!
answer: I'm sorry. You have to order at the drive thru menu...

question: What happened to the White Castle?
answer: Excuse me?

question: There used to be a White Castle right in this spot. Where is it?
answer: Oh yeah. There was a White Castle here. Look guys, I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but Burger Shack bought this location four years ago. HAROLD and KUMAR look at each other, devastated.

question: Please tell me there's another White Castle in town.
answer: Nope.

question: White Castle, here we come. I just wish we had some more pot. I'm almost completely sober right now. HAROLD ignores this. He's TYPING FEVERISHLY ON HIS LAPTOP-- trying to get his work done. Meanwhile, Kumar notices a sign on for the PRINCETON EXIT. Nice. Princeton. We're getting off here. Kumar takes the exit.
answer: Why?

question: We're gonna sweet talk Cindy Kim into finding us some weed.
answer: Oh no. I'm not seeing Cindy.

question: Why the fuck not? You talk to her on the phone all the time.
answer: She calls me. Then she rambles on about her East Asian Students club or whatever.

question: A twinkie?
answer: You know, yellow on the outside, white on the inside.

question: Look you twinkie bitch, you threw our weed out the window, so now it's your duty to make sure we're high as shit by the time we're eating those burgers.
answer: Well, I can't help you out there. Cindy doesn't smoke. She's not gonna help us.

question: As long as she buzzes us into a dorm, we're set. Give me ten minutes in there and I guarantee I'll find some hizzy.
answer: No, forget it. I'm not seeing Cindy Kim.

question: No, forget it. I'm not seeing Cindy Kim.
answer: I'm so glad you showed up, Harold!

question: Yeah. Me too.
answer: Did you like the Hibiscus petals I glued to the envelope I sent you?

question: Uh, yeah. They were...nice. Suddenly, one of the nerdy Asian students raises his hand. HAROLD looks at him strangely, and then over to Cindy. "Does this guy think I'm a teacher or something?" Harold sits there and stares at Kenneth for a while... Uh, yes?
answer: Kenneth Park. Class of 2004. Is it true you're an analyst at Brewster Keegan?

question: Yeah, I'm a junior analyst.
answer: Awesome! KENNETH high-fives with the nerdy Asian student next to him. He then raises his hand again. HAROLD rolls his eyes...

question: Yes?
answer: Uh, this is actually a two-part question. I'm applying for a summer internship at Brewster Keegan, and I was wondering a) what it's like being an investment banker and b) if you would write me a recommendation.

question: What it's like being an investment banker? Well Kenneth, to be honest, it's pretty... HAROLD looks into the eyes of the young, eager, Asian students. He can't bear to tell them the truth... ...awesome? All the Asian students start high-fiving with each other. As for the recommendation, I may be able to make a call or two... CINDY looks at her watch...
answer: Actually Harold, we should be getting to the party. We can discuss all this stuff there. It's just down the hall. All the Asian students get up...

question: Sorry, Cindy. I can't go. I have to wait for Kumar...
answer: You'll see him when we're done. Trust me, you're gonna love this. Kenny's mom dropped off a big jar of kimchi jigae. Kenneth looks proud of himself.

question: Hey! You know where I can get some chronic? The RANDOM STUDENT doesn't respond. Kumar is frustrated... What kind of Ivy League school is this?
answer: Heeey, Man. Lookin' to toke up? KUMAR breathes a sigh of relief...

question: Thank Christ! Look, just give me a dime of your finest herb. The Hippie Asshole opens his backpack. Inside, Kumar sees A GIANT PLASTIC BAG FILLED WITH WEED. He's awestruck... Oh my dear sweet lord... Kumar reaches for the weed, but the Hippie Asshole knocks his hand away...
answer: Yo, man! Not cool! This is my baby, man! That'll be eighty bucks.

question: Eighty bucks?! It's worth forty tops, bro! The Hippie Asshole grabs the baggy back from Kumar.
answer: I'm not your bro...bro. And if you feel like staying sober, go ahead, don't buy it. That's cool with me. I can find lots of people who want to get high. I can smoke it myself, man.

question: Jesus, what the hell kind of hippie are you?
answer: One who understands the concept of supply and demand, dude. Kumar and the Hippie Asshole stare each other down. After a couple seconds, Kumar shakes his head, pissed off. He takes out his wallet and hands all his cash to the Hippie Asshole. Dumbass. Suddenly, CHRISTY and CLARISSA approach carrying take-out bags. They see KUMAR and the Hippie Asshole making their deal.

question: That's bullshit. He's coming with me. Isn't that right, Rold? CINDY gives HAROLD an evil eye-- he's intimidated by her.
answer: Let's go to the party for a little while.

question: Fuck that! KUMAR notices an open dorm room nearby. He enters the room, and returns a few moments later dragging an ASIAN FRESHMAN in his pajamas. He pushes the Asian Freshman over to Cindy... Here-- this is Harold's understudy. You can do whatever you want with him. Let's go. KUMAR grabs HAROLD by the arm and drags him away. CINDY looks pissed as she watches HAROLD being taken away from her. I can't believe you were gonna ditch me for the Joy Luck Club. You know what their parties are like.
answer: Look, what do you want me to say? I was under pressure.

question: Just say "no"! That's all it takes. Now take a hit of this. Kumar hands Harold the joint...suddenly, a nearby door opens and a SECURITY GUARD enters the hall. He sees HAROLD and KUMAR with drugs. Quick. In here. The guys rush into the WOMEN'S BATHROOM.
answer: Shit! What if he finds us?

question: Oh great. Now I think I have to go. CHRISTY enters STALL NUMBER THREE and shuts the door. The sound of the door shutting causes HAROLD and KUMAR to turn their attention to the other stall. They then look at each other grossed out. From above, we see HAROLD and KUMAR struggling, while the girls have taken their places in the surrounding stalls.
answer: Ahhhhh! HAROLD and KUMAR look horrified. There is silence for a few seconds until....

question: Hey Clarissa. Do you wanna play battle shits? We see HAROLD quizzically mouth "battle shits?"
answer: Oh my God. We haven't played that since back in camp! HAROLD and KUMAR look confused.

question: Wait for it. Wait for it. Ahhhhh!
answer: Hit! HAROLD and Kumar look terrified.

question: I can't believe it. We were this close to getting high and getting laid.
answer: Oh, come on, you always exaggerate. We weren't gonna get laid.

question: Hey, the diarrhea twins would've had sex with us! And what about Cindy?! She was looking hot tonight! The fact that you're not into her just might make you gay!
answer: I know Cindy's cute, it's just...

question: What? You'd rather have Maria? From Harold's reaction, it's clear he hit it on the head.
answer: Look, it doesn't matter. I'm gonna end up with Cindy anyway. It's just more practical. Now can we drop this and get our asses to White Castle?

question: Fine. Suddenly, KUMAR pulls the car over to the side of the road...
answer: Now what are you doing?

question: Daddy needs to urinate. Harold rolls his eyes. Oh yes! Yes, that's nice. Excuse me...I'm sorry, I just have to ask you...why are you peeing here?
answer: What do you mean?

question: Why did you decide to piss here right next to me? Why not that bush over there?
answer: Well, this looked like a good bush to pee on. Why'd you choose this bush?

question: Nobody was here when I chose this bush.
answer: So you can pee here and nobody else can, is that it?

question: I was just saying....
answer: Is this like your special bush or something?

question: No, I just... You know what? Forget about it. I'm not in the mood to get stabbed right now. The CREEPY GUY calms down. He and KUMAR silently urinate next to each other for about TEN SECONDS, until the Creepy Guy subtly looks at Kumar's package.
answer: Nice pubes.

question: Thanks.
answer: Do you even know where you're going?

question: I'll be honest, I'm a little lost. But don't worry. Once we get on the highway, we'll be there soon.
answer: We better. It starts to rain... Shit, now it's raining.

question: What's the big deal?
answer: Look, I'm completely on edge right now, okay? After all the shit we've been through tonight, I don't know how much more of this I can take. AHHHHH!!! FUCK!!!! KUMAR turns and sees the raccoon on Harold.

question: Holy shit! HAROLD tries to pry the raccoon away from his neck. KUMAR tries to help him. How the hell did that get in here?
answer: Shit! It bit my neck! I probably have rabies now or something!

question: Don't worry. He didn't even break your skin. You'll be fine.
answer: Oh, that's not good!

question: Ahh! Dude, get that fucking cancer raccoon away from me!!! Thank Christ! Kumar looks back onto the road, where HE SEES A PAIR OF
answer: Uh-oh. KUMAR rolls down his window. The DRIVER peers inside...

question: Dude-- how were Katie Holmes' tits?
answer: You know the holocaust?

question: Yeah.
answer: Picture the exact opposite of that.

question: Apologize to Hashem.
answer: Who the hell is...

question: Just apologize!
answer: Okay, I'm sorry.

question: I don't have rabies. Kumar stands up quickly.
answer: Great, let's get out of here. Just as Harold and Kumar walk down the hallway to the EXIT... Shit.

question: Oh, now I see why you didn't want to come to the hospital. Kumar gives Harold an annoyed look as his dad approaches.
answer: Eat my balls, Saikat. Oh, come on, dad! You're right. I'm sorry. KUMAR gives HIS FATHER a hug. He even gives SAIKAT a hug. It won't happen again.

question: Wow. So I guess you're going to med school after all, huh?
answer: Fuck that! Like I care what my dad thinks. I can't wait to see the look on his face when he finds out I skipped the interview tomorrow. He wants to cut me off? Fine! I don't need his money!

question: But...you just hugged him...
answer: I just needed to get my hands on these... KUMAR holds up SAIKAT and HIS FATHER'S SCAN CARDS. Two words-- medical marijuana. HAROLD shakes his head in disgust. Look, I'm telling you, they see an Indian and Asian guy wearing these and they'll just assume we're doctors. Then we walk right into the pharmacy and get the weed. Harold does not appear happy he's doing this.

question: If we get caught, you're taking the blame. This wasn't my idea.
answer: We're not gonna get caught. We're gonna get toasted and then we're gonna eat delicious White Castle-- just like we planned. All of a sudden, a hand grabs Kumar from behind. Freaked out, they turn around and see a MALE NURSE .

question: What Dr. Lee is trying to say is that we need to sedate the patient first or else he could go into cardiac arrest. HAROLD looks at KUMAR confused and nervous.
answer: Alright. I'll get the anesthesiologist. The NURSE is about to rush away, but Kumar stops him.

question: Hold on. What we should probably use is marijuana. That'll sufficiently sedate the patient for surgery.
answer: Marijuana? But why...

question: We don't have time for questions! We need marijuana now! Get as much of it as possible! Like a big bag of it! KUMAR shows the amount he wants with his hands.
answer: But doctor, we don't have marijuana in this hospital. HAROLD gives KUMAR a dirty look.

question: Shit. Suddenly, more blood squirts from the Patient's chest. Harold shouts in disgust, making the Patient more nervous...
answer: We're losing him! You gotta do something!

question: Very well. I guess we'll have to do this the old fashioned way. KUMAR puts a nitrous oxide mask over the Patient's face. Harold gives Kumar a look-- "What the fuck are you doing?" First, we need to clear his C-spine. I want stat x-rays of the chest and abdomen. Give me two large bore IVs and start a ringers lactate push. Nurse, we need 2 units of O neg on board. Using the surgical equipment, Kumar actually begins removing bullets from the bleeding patient!!! Harold can't believe what's going on. Suddenly, the Patient begins having trouble breathing! He's gasping for air! The BEEPING SOUND monitoring his heart rate begins speeding up to an insane pace.
answer: Doctor! The patient is desatting! Kumar quickly examines the patient's chest...

question: Ah, I see. The Patient's got a collapsed lung. Get me a 14-gage Angiocath, stat! After a couple seconds go by... What's taking so long?
answer: Great catch doctor! His sat is up to 94! Kumar is cool and collected. He turns to the YOUNG MEDICAL TECHNICIANS who have been aiding the surgery.

question: Will one of you guys put the chest tube in and wrap this up? A chorus of "yes, doctors." Well, it looks like my work here is done. Kumar pulls the gas mask from the patient's face up to his face and takes a deep breath, getting a big hit of nitrous. He then leans down to the BLEEDING PATIENT, who is just barely conscious -- but seems in good spirits... Say, you wouldn't happen to know the quickest way to get to the White Castle in Cherry Hill from here, do you?
answer: I'm telling you. That was amazing! Even your dad would've been impressed!

question: Yeah. It wasn't bad.
answer: This is perfect! We're back on the road. We have directions now. The rain let up. And guess what... I'm officially done with my work. I'm telling you, things are finally starting to go our way. While they're stopped at a red light, Kumar takes in his surroundings and notices something...

question: Hey, check it out! Your movie's playing. Outside, to Kumar's left, on the marquee of a movie theater we see And look who went to see it... Harold looks at the crowd leaving the theater and sees MARIA standing outside, all by herself. He can't believe it.
answer: Holy shit.

question: You see? You thought you two had nothing in common. But it turns out you both have the same lame taste in movies. Hey, you wanna see if she wants to come with us to White Castle?
answer: No way. Forget about it. Just drive. Kumar puts his hands on Harold's shoulders to get his undivided attention.

question: Harold. It's one in the morning. We're an hour from home. And who do we see, but your dream girl standing outside a theater playing your favorite movie. I mean, if we were in a cheesy romantic comedy, and I was your annoying gay friend, this would be the moment I'd tell you "this is a sign."
answer: Stop it.

question: Come on. Just pretend you're a nerdy Asian Tom Hanks and she's a hot Latina Meg Ryan...with bigger tits. Besides, you yourself said things are starting to go our way...
answer: Let's just go! KUMAR presses a button CAUSING HAROLD'S WINDOW TO GO DOWN. What are you doing?!

question: Hey Maria! MARIA looks up. HAROLD QUICKLY DUCKS IN HIS SEAT. HE THEN Hey, get your hand off the gas! Kumar tries kicking Harold's hand off the gas. Just then, Oh shit! Harold's Infiniti HAS DRIVEN OFF THE ROAD AND IS SPEEDING
answer: You asshole! My car's probably all scratched up now!

question: Don't blame me. You're the one who ran us off the road!
answer: I told you I didn't want to speak to her! Whatever. Let's jut get back on the highway.

question: Fine. KUMAR presses the gas. Suddenly, we hear a "POP!" Harold and Kumar look at each other-- angry and frustrated.
answer: Godammit. You know how to change a flat?

question: Please. Only hicks and Italian guys know how to change a tire. Harold looks in his trunk for the spare. It's missing.
answer: Where's my spare tire?

question: I don't know.
answer: Shit, where the hell is it? Kumar suddenly remembers...

question: Oh yeah! Don't you remember that time we got baked and started throwing shit off that bridge to see if it would float?
answer: What bridge? What the hell are you talking about?

question: Oh shit. That's right. I was with Goldstein. We borrowed your car that day. My bad.
answer: Your bad? What are the hell are we gonna do now?! Suddenly, they see AN OLD PICK-UP TRUCK driving in their direction. HAROLD and KUMAR wave it down. The truck stops in front of them. The door opens and a SHADOWY FIGURE begins walking towards them. Harold and Kumar are nervous. As soon as the FIGURE reaches them, LIGHTENING STRIKES. Thanks for helping us out.

question: Eww-- check out those boils on his neck! HAROLD nudges him to be quiet. KUMAR looks back over at FREAK SHOW and sees that ONE OF THE BOILS IS PULSATING. Oh my God! You gotta look! One of them's actually pulsating!
answer: Will you shut up? He's right next to me! He can hear you! KUMAR sees that A WHITE PUSS IS NOW OOZING FROM THE BOIL.

question: Now there's some sort of puss! It's the most disgusting thing I've ever seen!
answer: What's the matter with you? You think that just because you're whispering, he can't hear what you're saying? He's two feet away from us. He can hear this entire conversation. He can hear me talking right now.

question: Wait a second-- what about Freak Show...and this whole Christian thing you guys have going on?
answer: Oh, so just because we're passionate about our Lord, you assume we don't know how to have a good time?

question: No, I just... Liane starts playing with the knot in her shirt. Harold and Kumar stare unabashedly. Harold looks outside the window, where he sees Freak Show changing the tire, apparently busy. Nevermind. Okay, rock, paper, scissors...
answer: Sorry-- if you boys want me, you gotta do me at the same time.

question: Huh?
answer: Come on. Give me the double stuff. HAROLD and KUMAR look at each other confused.

question: Come on. Give me the double stuff. HAROLD and KUMAR look at each other confused.
answer: I'm not sure we quite understand...

question: I want you both inside me simultaneously. HAROLD and KUMAR look at each other again, more confused and kind of disturbed. Kumar turns to LIANE...
answer: Um, are we talking about one hole or two?

question: I most certainly did not say that!
answer: No. You did. We both heard you.

question: Are you sure?
answer: Positive. FREAK SHOW ponders this.

question: Oh...my mistake then.
answer: No problem.

question: Well, since we're all here, why not make it a foursome? Who wants the first reach-around?
answer: Okay, let's agree never to talk about what just happened.

question: Okay, let's agree never to talk about what just happened.
answer: Agreed.

question: Dude, I have no idea where we are. All of a sudden, A HITCHHIKER waves them down up ahead. Hey, a hitchhiker. Should we pick him up?
answer: And get chopped to bits? Are you crazy? Kumar pulls over to the side of the road...

question: Oh, calm down. We're lost. He may know how to get us back on the highway.
answer: Fuck that! It's my car! We're not picking up a hitchhiker! The back door opens and Neil , gets into the car.

question: Yep.
answer: Holy shit, dude! Doogie Howser, M.D. was my favorite TV show growing up! You were my idol!

question: Hey, that's great. Do you think we could get going? I'm bored as shit back here.
answer: So, Neil, I have to ask you-- did you ever get it on with Wanda off the set?

question: Dude, I humped every piece of ass ever on that show.
answer: Even the chick who played the hot nurse?

question: Kumar-- you okay?
answer: Yeah, I just hate those dicks. Fuck it. At least now we know where we're going. I'm so friggin' hungry...

question: Did Doogie Howser just steal my fucking car?
answer: I think he did.

question: FUCK!!!!!! You! You had to pick up a hitchhiker!
answer: Rold, calm down!

question: Why the hell did you leave the keys in the car?!
answer: I figured that Neil Patrick Harris was a trustworthy guy. How was I supposed to know that he'd fuck us over?

question: This is all your fault! This whole fucking night! You know I leased that car! They're gonna make me pay for it! Harold starts to walk back to the convenience store.
answer: Where are you going?

question: I'm going to call the police! I don't want to talk to you anymore! Harold is about to walk in, when he sees Cole wind up and throw a Hostess-like snowball right in the Cashier's face. "Extremes" all around!
answer: There's a pay phone across the street, if you don't want to deal with those assholes. So after you talk to the cops we're still going to White Castle, right?

question: I'm not speaking to you. Harold waits for the "DON'T WALK" sign to change. It doesn't. HE STARTS PRESSING THE "WALK" BUTTON REPEATEDLY.
answer: You know, pressing the button a bunch of times doesn't make the sign change any faster. The computer responds to the first press. Every press after that is extraneous.

question: Thank you, Mr. Wizard. HAROLD waits for a few seconds, but when the light doesn't change, he begins pressing the button again. Jesus Christ! When are they gonna fucking develop button technology that'll understand urgency? The "DON'T WALK" sign still won't change. Kumar looks to the left and then to the right. The street is completely empty and there is no place for a police car to hide.
answer: This is ridiculous. Just walk across.

question: It'll change in a second. They stand there for another ten seconds. It doesn't change.
answer: Come on, there's not a car in sight!

question: Alright fine. You want me to cross? I'll cross. Just leave me alone! Harold starts walking angrily across the street.
answer: Finally.

question: Yeah, Koo-mar. Bust your ass. What's with that name -- Koo-mar -- with like three o's and shit. What happened to good old fashioned American names like Dave, Jim... Harold points to his ID.
answer: Harold. Harold is starting to pacify Palumbo.

question: Yes. Harold. That's a great name. You should be proud of that name, son.
answer: Thank you. OFFICER PALUMBO hands Harold his ticket and begins to walk away.

question: Can I at least give you my car's licence plate number? Ignoring Harold, Palumbo turns up the volume on his radio... So what are you in here for?
answer: For being black.

question: Come on. Seriously. TARIK sits up. He looks at OFFICER PALUMBO who, with his Walkman on, is oblivious to their conversation.
answer: I am serious. You wanna know what happened? Harold nods. I was walking out of a Barnes and Noble, and a cop stops me. Evidently, a black man robbed a store in Newark. Therefore, since I'm black, it was probably me, right? Harold shrugs his shoulders. Well that was the logic the cop used. I told him I haven't even been to Newark in months. Then he pointed a gun at me and told me to stop resisting arrest. I said, "Hey, I'm not resisting anything." So he starts beating me with his gun, screaming at me, telling me to stop resisting.

question: Holy shit. What did you do?
answer: I kept saying, "I understand that I'm under arrest. Please stop beating me." But that didn't work. Then another cop showed up. Then another. When it was all said and done, it took nine cops to bring me in here.

question: That fucking blows! Tarik nods and continues reading his book. Harold sees that Tarik is remarkably relaxed. I don't understand how you're able to be so calm about all this.
answer: Son, I'm fat. I'm black. I can't dance. And I have two gay fathers. I've had people messing with me my whole life. I learned a long time ago, there's no point in getting all riled up every time a bunchy of idiots gives you a hard time. Because in the end, the universe tends to unfold as it should. So what are you in here for?

question: Assaulting an officer.
answer: They tried to pin that shit on you too?

question: That was strange. Suddenly, a loud banging sound is made from a VENTILATION SHAFT on the ceiling, above one of the officer's desks. What the hell was that?
answer: Rold? Is that you?

question: Kumar?! What the fuck are you doing?!
answer: Are the cops still there?

question: No, they... Wait a second, did you...
answer: I called and made up some story about a shooting in Millbrook park...

question: Jesus Christ! What did you do that for?!
answer: I'm fucking starving! I figured I'd bust you out, and we'd get over to White Castle.

question: Forget it! I don't want to get in any more trouble! I'm already in here because of you!
answer: Hey, fuck you! What did you want me to do? Stand there and take the hit? You know, I've never taken a swing at you before. Never.

question: Look, Rold, I'm sorry. But you're not the only one dealing with shit. My dad's cutting me off, remember?
answer: Hey asshole, I'm in jail! Don't bitch to me about your problems! Just leave me alone. I don't want your help.

question: You don't want my help? Fine! I'm outta here! Uh...Rold? How do I get out of here? Tarik rolls his eyes in disbelief.
answer: How the hell should I know?

question: This isn't good. We hear the banging noise again. And again. Suddenly, THE
answer: Jesus Christ. Tarik shakes his head.

question: Ow...my ass. Kumar gets up and walks over to the cell. You sure you don't want to get out?
answer: And become a fugitive? Are you nuts? The guy has all my information. Harold points to Palumbo's desk, which has the police report, Harold's I.D., and his laptop.

question: So what? We'll take everything he wrote down about you and leave. Unless you want to stay here all night and not be able to hand your work in tomorrow. Harold thinks about this for a second.
answer: Fine. Hurry up. Kumar smiles. He begins searching for a key.

question: Yes! I was hoping it would be one of these big ring of keys. Now I get to try all of them to see which one will...
answer: Kumar, hurry the fuck up! Kumar runs over to the cell door. He tries out a couple keys, when he suddenly smells something...

question: What's that smell? Kumar turns his head and sees the ENORMOUS BAG OF WEED on Officer Reilly's desk.
answer: Kumar?...Kumar! Kumar can't hear Harold. He's in a trance. We begin to hear a romantic song as Kumar stares lovingly at the BAG OF WEED... What the hell are you... Suddenly, all six police officer come back into the room, pushing a black man wearing pajamas . Nathaniel seems very gentle. He's even wearing a turtleneck sweater.

question: Wait-- shouldn't we do something about this?
answer: Hurry up!

question: Jesus Christ! That place was a fucking mad house! Thanks for getting me out of there, dude.
answer: Hey, man, the burgers wouldn't taste as good if you weren't there. Dude, look at this. It's like we went from being broke to being millionaires. Suddenly, they hear what sounds like A COYOTE'S HOWL.

question: What was that?
answer: Just a coyote. Don't worry.

question: Aren't people supposed to be scared of coyotes?
answer: That's only because they sound scary. In one on one combat, either one of us can take a coyote down. Now cheetahs, they're another story. The CHEETAH stares HAROLD and KUMAR down.

question: We're gonna die.
answer: Just calm down. Cheetahs are used to eating zebras and shit. They're not known for eating humans.

question: We're gonna die.
answer: Okay, I'll admit, that's not a good sign. But I'm sure if we just stay calm he'll probably leave us alone. HAROLD and KUMAR stand silently. SLOWLY, the CHEETAH begins walking directly over to HAROLD...

question: This isn't working.
answer: Shhh. Suddenly, the CHEETAH OPENS HIS MOUTH WIDE AND CHOMPS DOWN ON I thought I told you not to take that jerky! HAROLD simply falls to the ground relieved that he hasn't been eaten. The Cheetah walks over to Harold and begins licking Harold's face in friendship.

question: He likes me. Suddenly, Kumar's eyes light up...
answer: Dude, I think I have an idea.

question: What is it?
answer: I'll tell you, but first we have to get really high. Kumar opens the bag of weed. Pan up to the night sky for a time lapse. We see smoke coming up from below. Pan back down...

question: Has it come to this? Are we really gonna ride this cheetah?
answer: Hey, cheetahs are the fastest animals on the planet. It's as good as a car. Kumar takes one last drag of a joint and flicks it away.

question: This is either a really smart move, or by far the stupidest thing we've ever done. HAROLD puts his arms around KUMAR to hold on. Kumar puts the bag of weed under his shirt...
answer: Well, we'll soon find out. Mush! Mush!

question: Dude, am I just really high or is this is actually working?!
answer: Both!

question: What the hell are you doing?!!!
answer: I'm sorry! You've been out cold for the past half-hour! I figured that maybe if I did some gay shit you'd wake up. HAROLD wipes his face with his sleeve. He then gets up-- he sees that they are by a random road, all by themselves.

question: What happened to the cheetah?
answer: It ran away. But forget about that. I have some bad news and some worse news.

question: Tell me the worse news first.
answer: I checked out some road signs. The cheetah took us in the wrong direction.

question: That sucks. What's the bad news?
answer: Your laptop is completely destroyed. Kumar points to the laptop, which is outside of it's bag, broken in pieces.

question: WHAT????????
answer: It smashed against a tree when you fell off the cheetah.

question: Why the hell didn't you say that THAT was the "worse news"?
answer: Well, the laptop really only effects you. Whereas the White Castle situation effects both of us equally.

question: Oh no! No! No!
answer: Don't worry, dude. Your laptop's insured.

question: It's not that! All my work was saved in there! Now I gotta go back to the office and re-do everything!
answer: Exactly. First, we'll take a cab over to White Castle, then we'll...

question: Forget White Castle. There's no time!
answer: Come on, Rold! You can get that shit done in a couple hours. We can't quit now! Fine...We'll find a pay phone and get a cab back to your office. Harold, furious and almost in tears, simply nods "yes." Look, there's a Krispee Kreme. We'll call from there. Oh great. Here we go again. COLE and the EXTREME SPORTS PUNKS are hacky-sacking in the parking lot. Their skateboards are sitting nearby.

question: Fucking asshole. Suddenly, HAROLD stops in his tracks. He's noticed something through the Krispee Kreme window. He stops KUMAR and points...
answer: Look! Through the window, we see ROSENBERG and GOLDSTEIN inside, sitting at a booth. They both have a dozen donuts and five cartons of milk. It looks like they just sat down... Goldstein savors his first bite of his POWDERED BLUEBERRY FILLED DONUT and Rosenberg licks his fingers after his first bite of his CHOCOLATE CREAM FILLED DONUT. HAROLD and KUMAR watch through the window longingly... I want that.

question: What? A chocolate cream filled?
answer: No. I want that feeling. The feeling that comes over a man when he finally gets exactly what he desires. I NEED that feeling.

question: Are you saying what I think you're saying?
answer: We gotta go to White Castle. KUMAR gives HAROLD a hug.

question: Yes! I knew you had it in you! Suddenly, Kumar notices something else inside. Someone else is sitting down at Rosenberg & Goldstein's table... Is that Cindy Kim? Harold watches as Cindy Kim sits down next to Goldstein. Goldstein puts his arm around her and feeds her a piece of donut. It looks like Goldstein and Cindy are "an item." You should have boned her when you had the chance. Before Harold can respond, he's hit in the back of the head by a hacky sack! Cole and the Punks laugh at Harold.
answer: Hey, why don't you just leave us alone?

question: What the hell are you doing?!
answer: I'm stealing their car.

question: This is your plan?
answer: It's working isn't it?

question: Victory is sweet! Nice job, Roldy!
answer: I had to do something. KUMAR begins sniffing something in the air...

question: Wait. Do you smell that? KUMAR keeps sniffing. He turns around to the back seat. He reaches back and picks something up from off the floor. It's a WHITE CASTLE bag. He pours out the contents and we see EMPTY WHITE CASTLE HAMBURGER CARTONS fall onto Kumar's lap. Those assholes got to have White Castle?!
answer: This world is so unfair.

question: Don't worry . Forget about that. We have a car now. We're back in the game. Pretty soon we'll be eating our own White Castle. Want me to drive?
answer: No. I've got everything under control. We should be able to get there with enough time for me to get my work done after our feast. Just find us some tunes. A tape is resting in the tape deck. KUMAR pushes it in... HAROLD and KUMAR look at each other amazed that COLE has some lame chick song on his tape.

question: Those guys are fucking posers! Dude, we're almost there!
answer: Bingo.

question: Oh shit! KUMAR turns around and sees the police car behind them.
answer: I found them. And I'm gonna need back-up. Oh boy! We got a chase on our hands!

question: Where the hell are we going?!
answer: Just hold on!

question: It's a good thing I have an empty stomach, or else I'd puke right now!
answer: Don't worry. We're gonna make it. Everything's gonna be...

question: Rold! Look out there!
answer: Oh shit! We're trapped! Kumar notices something...

question: Not necessarily. KUMAR walks over to the JEEP and points to the HANG-GLIDER...
answer: No. No way. Not a chance. I'd rather turn myself in than die.

question: Dude, it's okay. I used to hang-glide with my dad all the time when I was kid. I know how to do it.
answer: You hang-glided? I don't remember that.

question: We did it on our trips to India. I swear. I know exactly what I'm doing. I've even done it with two people at the same time. My brother and I did it.
answer: No, Kumar. I'm not risking my life over a bunch of hamburgers. KUMAR walks over to HAROLD and stares him in the eye...

question: You think this just about the burgers, huh? Well, let me tell you-- it's about far more than that. KUMAR walks over to the edge of the cliff and looks out onto the EARLY MORNING HORIZON. The sun is still rising. The scene is very picturesque... Our parents came to this country, escaping persecution, poverty, and hunger. Hunger, Harold. They were very, very hungry. And they wanted to live in a land that treated them as equals. A land where their kids could study and get into good colleges. A land filled with hamburger stands. And not just one type of hamburger. Hundreds of types-- with different sizes, toppings, and condiments. That land was America. You think this is just about the burgers? No. This is about achieving what our parents set out for. This is about the pursuit of happiness. This is about the American dream. KUMAR walks over to HAROLD. And so we've reached this point. The point which all men eventually have to face. The point of no return. We can stay here, get arrested and end our hopes of ever going to White Castle. Or we can take the hang-glider and make our leap towards freedom. I leave the decision up to you. From the sound of the sirens, it seems that the police are getting closer. Harold turns back, facing Kumar...
answer: I hate you, Kumar. Hurry up...they're almost here!

question: Grab onto the end of the bars and hold on tight. HAROLD does as he's told. They are both holding onto the bars . Okay. Here's how this is gonna work. On the count of three, we're gonna run to the edge of the cliff. When I say "jump," launch yourself forward as if you were diving into a pool, got it?
answer: I think so.

question: Don't worry-- everything's gonna be fine. Are you ready? HAROLD's too nervous to speak. KUMAR gets into position. Okay, here goes. One...two...three! HAROLD and KUMAR START RUNNING TOWARDS THE CLIFF. Good job, Rold! Keep running! Rold, there's something I gotta tell you. I've never hang-glided before.
answer: WHAT???

question: JUMP!!!
answer: Oh my God! Oh my God! Oh my God!

question: Dude, it's working!
answer: I can't believe you lied to me!

question: Dude, we're so high right now.
answer: We're not low. They continue gliding though the sky for a while...

question: Hey, Kumar?
answer: Yeah?

question: How are we gonna get down?
answer: Uh...well...I guess it's just gonna go down at some point.

question: That's a great answer. Made me feel really comfortable. Thanks a lot. KUMAR looks down as they fly over a playground. Is it a problem if we fly into birds?
answer: Why do you ask?

question: Because we're about to! KUMAR looks up and sees at least A HUNDRED CROWS FLYING
answer: Oh shit! HAROLD AND KUMAR FLY RIGHT INTO THE CROWS. Numerous birds collide with their faces...

question: Ahhhh! My eyes! Don't peck out my eyes!
answer: We're gonna die! We're gonna die!

question: I hate you! I hate you so much!
answer: We're gonna live! Ha! Ha! We're gonna live! You see, Rold? That wasn't so bad.

question: That's it...I'm gonna kill you...
answer: Stop...I...can't...breathe...

question: That's the point!
answer: Rold...

question: You're gonna die!
answer: Rold...look! We made it, dude.

question: I want thirty slyders. I want five french fries. I want four large Cherry cokes.
answer: Same. Only make mine Diet Cokes.

question: Hey...hey...hey...where's my money?!
answer: You don't have money?! Shit, I gave all mine to that asshole at Princeton! Fuck that hippie fuck! This can't be happening! We're so close and we're fucking broke! What are you doing here?

question: I know. It was a dick move on my part. That's why I'm paying for your meal. Harold and Kumar look at each other, relieved.
answer: Thanks, I guess. NEIL hands them some cash...

question: Here's fifty for the meal, and two hundred for the car.
answer: What happened to the car?

question: I made some love stains in the back seat. You'll see. Anyway, take it easy guys. I'll see you around.
answer: Where are you going?

question: Wait...let's do it together.
answer: Oh...that hit the spot.

question: It was the best meal of my life.
answer: Mine too. The two of them sit there, looking at all the empty containers and wrappers. After a long pause of silence, KUMAR speaks...

question: Dude, you know what? I think I may actually go to my interview today.
answer: Seriously?

question: Yeah. You know, my whole life I've been afraid being just another nerdy Indian guy turned doctor. Well, tonight got me thinking... There are far worse things in the world than being tagged for having a natural ability in medicine... HAROLD pretends to be listening to KUMAR-- BUT HE IS MORE FOCUSED ON BILLY AND J.D., who get out of the car with their women and start walking towards the front door. Like having boils all over your face. Or dealing with the shit those black guys had to go through.
answer: Uh-huh.

question: Besides, I have to admit, it felt pretty cool saving that guy's life last night. Somewhere between that, getting yelled at by my dad, and seeing Neil Patrick Harris, I realized that I've always wanted to be a doctor-- I've just been too scared to admit it. KUMAR sees that HAROLD isn't paying attention... Hey, Rold, are you listening to me? I'm having a major epiphany here.
answer: I'll be right back... At that moment, BILLY and J.D. walk in the restaurant with their women, ZOE and TRACY, respectively. TRACY looks like some bimbo slut that J.D. picked up at a strip club. ZOE, On the other hand, has a sweet RENEE ZELLWEGER quality about her. She and Billy are the perfect Hollywood couple...

question: I'll be right back... At that moment, BILLY and J.D. walk in the restaurant with their women, ZOE and TRACY, respectively. TRACY looks like some bimbo slut that J.D. picked up at a strip club. ZOE, On the other hand, has a sweet RENEE ZELLWEGER quality about her. She and Billy are the perfect Hollywood couple...
answer: I'll be there in a second... J.D. and TRACY check out the menu. BILLY takes ZOE aside-- whatever their story is, it seems to have reached the "you complete me" moment... Look, I have to admit something to you. At the start of last night, all I really cared about was getting some. But then I met you, Zoe. You're so different from all the other women I've ever met. You're smart, funny, artistic. I guess what I'm trying to say is...

question: What the fuck is going on here? BILLY turns around and sees HAROLD...
answer: Harold? What are you...?

question: Never mind me. What are you doing here? I thought you and J.D. were busy all night with "clients." Isn't that why I had to do YOUR work? Back off, cock boy! What I have to say to him goes double for you! KUMAR sees what's going on-- he can't believe it. Yeah, you know I did. You're just stalling because you're not quick enough to think of a comeback.
answer: Listen Harry...

question: Tell him what? That I'm your work horse! That you guys think you can just party all weekend and leave all your work to the quiet Asian guy in your office! Huh? J.D. is stunned. Now he's a little nervous. No, YOU don't understand. I'm not doing your work anymore. And I'll tell everyone in the office how you both caught gonorrhea from that whore. TRACI and ZOE hear this and are freaked out. They slowly back away from BILLY and J.D.... Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to get going. See you on Monday. HAROLD leaves the RESTAURANT. KUMAR follows. Billy and J.D. are left embarrassed and in shock.
answer: Way to go, Rold! Where the hell did that come from?

question: I don't know. Eating those delicious burgers made me feel like a new man. Now I'm actually looking forward to work this week.
answer: No shit! I guess you're worthwhile after all.

question: I'm not worthless.
answer: So those dudes have gonorrhea?

question: Beats me. Now, come on, let's get going.
answer: What's the rush? There's plenty of time before my interview.

question: I have some unfinished business to take care of. They both get into the car . The car zooms out...
answer: Good luck, dude. KUMAR stands behind, while HAROLD approaches MARIA'S door.

question: What do you want?
answer: Oh...uh...nothing...wrong room.

question: Hey, Papi's coming! Hold on! This girl is crazy, man.
answer: Look, I really don't need to hear it. I guess I just made a mistake. Sorry for interrupting you guys... Harold starts to walk away, almost crying. SAD, DEPRESSING MUSIC BEGINS TO PLAY. Kumar feels sorry for his friend. Just then, Luis leans his head out the door...

question: Hey-- if you're looking for Maria, she left for Europe this morning. Harold quickly turns around and runs back over.
answer: Huh?

question: She's going to Amsterdam for ten days. I'm Luis -- Maria's brother. Luis shakes Harold's hand. Harold suddenly feels better.
answer: Oh! Maria's brother!

question: You must be that Chinese guy Maria keeps talking about.
answer: Actually, I'm Kor...wait a second-- she talks about me? A HOT BLACK CHICK , wearing only a bra and g-string, walks over to Luis and wraps her arms around him...

question: Hey, I'll be there in a second, baby. Do me a favor-- make me that omelette you were talking about. You know, with the sun-dried tomatoes. Aisha kisses him, and walks away to the kitchen. Luis gives her a little a slap on the ass. Harold doesn't quite know how to respond to this. So you want me to leave her a message or something?
answer: Uh, no thanks. I'd rather do it in person.
